      • ipv6

        public Endpoint.Builder ipv6(byte[] ipv6)
        When not null, this sets the Endpoint.ipv6, unless the input is an IPv4-Compatible or IPv4-Mapped Embedded IPv6 Address. In such case, ipv4(int) is called with the embedded address.
        See Also:
        Endpoint.ipv6

      • port

        public Endpoint.Builder port(int port)
        Use this to set the port to an externally defined value.

        Don't pass Endpoint.port to this method, as it may result in a NullPointerException. Instead, use Endpoint.toBuilder() or port(Short).

        Parameters:
        port - port associated with the endpoint. zero coerces to null (unknown)
        See Also:
        Endpoint.port

      • port

        public Endpoint.Builder port(Short port)
        See Also:
        Endpoint.port

        public Endpoint build()
